ctx: Mio Moov 310 in težave z zagonom iGo Primo
content:
iGO Primo 2.4 - 9.6.13.405512 - (18 Jun 2014) Multires želim naložiti na Moov 310, vsebino appstartupsec.ini sem spremenil tako:
 
	
	



	
		Koda:
	
	
		[Process1]
RelativePath=False
ProcessFile=\\iGo\\MobileNavigator.exe
ProcessCmdLine=
ProcessDbgFile=
ProcessDbgCmdLine=
MaxRestarts=3
Major=TRUE
WindowName=MioMap
MaxCloseMessages=10
	

iGo mapa je v root navigacije. Dobim pa sporočilo da resolucija ni podprta oz da ne najde skina.
resolucija je 480x272
v data.zip datoteki lahko najdem to datoteko in skin, sys.txt nisem nič spreminjal.

Hvala!
author: micho88

ctx: Mio Moov 310 in težave z zagonom iGo Primo
content: navedi vsebino sys datoteke. To je osnoven podatek ko gre za reševanje tovrstnih težav.
author: Janch

ctx: Mio Moov 310 in težave z zagonom iGo Primo
content:
[folders]
has_secondary_root=0

[interface]
show_exit=1
connection_enabled=0
enable_natural_guidance=1
enable_stateanim=1
capture_to_jpeg=1

[gps] 
set_messages=0 

[loading] 
show_statustext=1

[sound.voice]
drive_sentence_without_force="1"

[power] 
skip_suspend_process=1
skip_resume_process=1
skip_suspend_process_all=1
skip_resume_process_all=1

[debug]
skip_eula=1
experimental_features=1
;hnr_silent_startup=1
;max_memory=73400320
;reserve_memory=5242880
screenshotfilename="captures\screen_%02d.jpeg" 
screenshotsavecameraini=0 

[route]
hnr_ignored_missing_country_ids=*

[hnr]
ignored_missing_country_ids=*

[navigation]
show_current_city=1
parking_ad_enabled=0
congestion_ad_enabled=0
junction_view_blink_time=1000;(0) lane arrow blinks every 1 sec
junction_view_blink_time_no_lane=1000;(0) lane arrow blinks every 1 sec

[route.histspeed]
enabled=1
show=1
use_timeslice=1

[map_update_checker]
enabled=0

[sound]
csv_voice_enabled=1
ding_muted=1

[2d]
traffic_lights=1

[3d]
usepolyfarroads=0

[poi]
featured_provider=netlocalsearch.naviextras.google
provider_filtering=1

[network]
available=0

[http]
enabled=0
 
[naviextras]
boot_service_address="http://zippy.naviextras.com/services/index/rest/2/boot"
 
[tmc-http]
enabled=0
start=1
dt_dl_0=120.0
dl_dist_0_km=500.0
servers.size=1
servers[0].url="http://zippy.naviextras.com/services/tmclite/data/nng-igo-tmc-iphone/0/" 

[roundaboutcam]
enabled=1 

[camera.roundabout]
enabled=1

[camera.intersection_zoom]
enabled=1

[3d] 
max_pois_on_horizont=5

[warning]
speedcam_enabled=1
speedcam_warning=1
is_spoken=1

content:
uporabi točno tole sys:

[gps]
port="2"
baud="57600"
set_messages=0

[sound]
csv_voice_enabled=1 
ding_muted=1
maneuver_chimes=0

[rawdisplay]
screen_x=480
screen_y=272

[power]
skip_suspend_process=1
skip_resume_process=1
skip_suspend_process_all=1
skip_resume_process_all=1
backlight_manage_values="1"
backlight_max="100"
backlight_min="0"
backlight_methods="39"
backlight_day="100"
backlight_night="100"
powermgm_state="0"
backlight_manage_keys = 1
backlight_reverse = 0
backlight_key_timeout_BA = "BatteryTimeout"
backlight_key_timeout_AC = "ACTimeout"
backlight_key_ontap_BA = "BacklightOnTap"
backlight_key_ontap_AC = "ACBacklightOnTap"
backlight_key_on_BA = "OnOff"
backlight_key_on_AC = "ExtOnOff"
backlight_events = 1
disconnect_gps_on_suspend=0

Hvala.
Sem poskusil in rezulatat je isti
author: micho88

ctx: Mio Moov 310 in težave z zagonom iGo Primo
content: sem točno to verzijo Prima testiral zdajle v wince emulatorju z resolucijo 480x272 in normalno zažene, tudi s tvojo prvo sys datoteko. Mogoče imaš kaj defekten data.zip. Sploh če si karkoli spreminjal znotraj. Že če si odpakiral in nazaj zapakiral je lahko problem, če si delal z winrar verzijo višjo od 3.9. Še enkrat kopiraj data.zip direktno iz mape, kamor ti je preneslo torrent. Če ne bo delovalo pa se javi na ZS, ti bom dal drug link.
author: Janch

ctx: Mio Moov 310 in težave z zagonom iGo Primo
content:
data.zip prepisal še enkrat z originalom in dela 
	

	
	
		
		

		
			
		
		
	


	
		
	



Najlepša hvala za pomoč, kje lahko dam za pivo?
author: micho88

ctx: Mio Moov 310 in težave z zagonom iGo Primo
content:
sem ga ravno spil... 
	

	
	
		
		

		
		
	


	
		
	




še ena mala skrivnost. Če bi rad, da ti Primo bere vsebino iz SD kartice, si lahko umisliš 4 ali 8 gb kartico in:

Iz mape Primo, ki jo imaš na napravi izrežeš mapo content in jo kopiraš v root kartice. Nato samo dodaj v sys:

[folders]
content="\Storage Card\Content"
author: Janch
